description.value: Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised. When you target a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] opponent while you are raging, you reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or to 9 for a hidden one.
